messages.title: Labour and Tory smear campaign exposed
messages.content: Smear tactics undone by evidence. Labour aides have been exposed for telling a series of lies. Lies in election literature about Dr Jo Crotty.

messages.title: Don't be conned by Labour
messages.content: Desperate Labour bosses facing defeat are telling lies. Voters should be on their guard.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will give you the power to sack corrupt MPs, stop MPs being bought by millionaire and billionaire donors, and make politicians work for the people again.

mentions.tacticalSituation: YOUR VOTE could decide who wins in Warrington South.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour have let in thousands for the North West, it is clear Warrington South requires a strong voice for Warrington in Europe.
issues.governance: Clean Up Politics - The Liberal Democrats will give you the power to sack corrupt MPs, stop MPs being bought by millionaire and billionaire donors, and make politicians work for the people again.
issues.health: Dr Jo Crotty can protect hospitals and NHS.

housing.content: Dr Jo Crotty can protect hospitals and NHS.

quotes.text: Labour will lie, lie and lie again to win re-election

images.caption: Dr Jo Crotty meeting with senior health officials
Chris Davies MEP celebrating his recent victory with Dr Jo Crotty in Warrington
